name: Monster Living in A Cave Terrorizes Nearby Village! -compo
name_original: Monster Living in A Cave Terrorizes Nearby Village! -compo
description:
Much improved post-compo version can be found here!

My LD#33 entry. Game about attacking villagers while they try to run away during the turn-based combat.

Pick 3 actions out of 6 to do each turn.

Use wasd or arrow keys to move around the map and mouse or 1-6 and space in battles.
